channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Going Soft On Illegal Labor Is A Betrayal Of American Workers Like My Family
item.description: Competitors blew past my parents like they were standing still, mostly thanks to the stream of cheap, illegal labor my parents refused to tap into.

item.title: Nike delays launch for new brand with Kim Kardashian’s Skims
item.description: Both Nike and Skims have bet heavily on the partnership.

item.title: Israeli defense minister says Iran’s supreme leader ‘should not continue to exist’ after Iranian missiles wound 240
item.description: Israel carried out strikes on Iran’s Arak heavy water reactor.

item.title: Discounted college tuition for illegal immigrants policy leads DOJ to sue Kentucky

item.title: What Sports Can Teach America About Swift Justice
item.description: Athletes have a code, one that’s missing on social media and in politics.

item.title: Tariffs, war, and inequality have battered the luxury goods market—Gucci sales are down 24%
item.description: Global sales of personal luxury goods are ”slowing down but not collapsing,” according to a Bain & Co. consultancy study.

item.description: Memories of an art-world star and cherished friend.

item.title: Sorry, Democrats: Republican Work Requirements Are Modest — and Empowering
item.description: Able-bodied adults on welfare are capable of lifting up themselves and America. What a shame that Democrats refuse to see it.

item.title: The Wrong Way to Build a Nuclear Renaissance
item.description: The real bottleneck to nuclear progress in America isn’t a lack of federal financing.

item.title: Team USA Fans Want To Cheer For Red, White, And Blue, Not Pride Rainbows

item.title: Why Non-Woke Indie Video Games Like Clair Obscur Are Going Gangbusters
item.description: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 presages the fall of woke gaming titans in its own indie gaming moment because it refused to bow to leftist ideology.
